1.0.0.name: wordpress/adsense-explosion
1.0.0.description:
Automatically Insert and Optimize Google Adsense code to your site for increase your profits. Here are some of the reasons why this plugin is fantastic:

Features

  1. Help you to create the AdSense Privacy Policy page
  2. Helps you to reduce the risk of ban from the Google program.
  3. Add ads in content, but also in sidebar, footer, header ….
  4. Not more than 3 ads per page to meet google policy
  5. Multi Language Supported (English, Español, Italiano)
  6. Number of ads can be dependent on the post length.
  7. ads widget
  8. Intelligent insertion without breaking lists, pictures etc.
  9. Comfortable definition of ad size, layout and colors in admin panel.
  10. different channels for all ads to control and optimize different styles, colors etc.

PS: You'll need a Google AdSense Account.

New in this Release

Compatibility with WP3.6.
